TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewEditEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會引發事件時的 [編輯] 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 [編輯]) 按下時，之前控制項進入編輯模式。The control raises the event when an Edit button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Edit") is clicked, but before the control enters edit mode. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消編輯作業，每次這個事件發生時的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the edit operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您決定要編輯之資料列的索引，並指出應該取消編輯作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the row being edited and to indicate that the edit operation should be canceled. 若要取消編輯作業，請設定的屬性物件到`true`。To cancel the edit operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件傳遞至事件處理方法來取消編輯作業，如果使用者嘗試編輯包含作者姓氏空白的資料列。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method to cancel the editing operation if the user attempts to edit a row that contains an author with the last name White. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowEditing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEditing/CS/gridviewroweditingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowEditing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEditing/VB/gridviewroweditingvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`newEditIndex` 參數的值。The value of the `newEditIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 引發事件時，這個建構函式會使用主要由控制項開發人員。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

summary.span: 取得或設定要編輯之資料列的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the row being edited.

value.span: 要編輯之資料列的索引。

span.span: The index of the row being edited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷正在編輯之資料列的索引。Use the property to determine the index of the row being edited. 資料列索引通常用來擷取此資料列的集合控制項，可讓您存取資料列的屬性。The row index is often used to retrieve this row from the collection of the control, which allows you to access the row's properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷正在編輯之資料列的索引。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the index of the row being edited. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowEditing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEditing/CS/gridviewroweditingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowEditing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEditing/VB/gridviewroweditingvb.aspx#1)]
